privacy_point1: Data Collection: User-provided information such as name, phone number, and report details is collected.
privacy_point2: Use of Information: Data is used to improve services, communicate in emergencies, and ensure user safety.
privacy_point3: Data Sharing: Personal information is not shared with third parties unless legally required or for security investigations.
privacy_point4: Data Protection: Information is secured with measures to prevent unauthorized access or use.
privacy_point5: User Rights: Users can modify or delete their data at any time via account settings.
privacy_point6: Updates: This policy may be updated as needed, with notification to users of important changes.
faq_q1: 1. How can I report a missing case?
faq_a1: You can go to the 'Add Report' page from the bottom bar, fill in the required information such as name, age, last seen location, and optionally add a photo.
faq_q2: 2. Can I edit a report after publishing it?
faq_a2: Yes, you can edit report details through the 'My Reports' page and select the report you want to edit.
faq_q3: 3. How do I know if a report near me has been added?
faq_a3: You will receive an instant notification if a report is registered in your area, and you can check details in the 'Notifications' page.
faq_q4: 4. What is the benefit of saving reports?
faq_a4: The 'Saved' feature helps you easily follow important reports without searching for them again.
faq_q5: 5. How can I contact the report owner?
faq_a5: Inside the report details page, you can tap 'Contact' to choose the preferred method (call or chat).
faq_q6: 6. How do I keep my account safe?
faq_a6: Do not share your login credentials with anyone.
faq_q7: 7. Can I permanently delete my account?
faq_a7: Yes, you can delete your account from 'Profile' ‚Üí 'Delete Account', note this action is irreversible.
faq_a8: Yes, the app is completely free and does not require any fees.
contact_intro: We are here to assist you anytime. If you have any questions or inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us.
about_us_desc: We are ITC Team, a group of young ambitious developers aiming to deliver innovative apps that simplify users' lives, combining technology with simplicity and creativity.
our_goal_desc: An app designed to simplify reporting missing cases and tracking reports safely and quickly, with instant notifications and effective community collaboration.
